p: Levels of TNF-α, IL-6, IL-10, IFN-γ, and IFN-β cytokines in the blood serum of mice infected with the H1N1 influenza virus were determined using ELISA kits according to the manufacturer’s recommended procedure. The optical density of the samples was measured using a STAT FAX 3200 immunoassay analyzer (Awareness, USA) at a wavelength of 450 nm.
